species.name: florges
descriptions: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
It controls the flowers it grows. The petal blizzards that Florges triggers are overwhelming in their beauty and power.
Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.

abilities.name: flower-veil
abilities.effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: symbiosis
abilities.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
